|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== DNXA-97 is an 802.11n, 2.4GHz, 2x2, half-size mini PCIe card which is designed for embedding into ultra-compact devices with optimal balance of performance and power consumption. It delivers up to 300Mbps data rate for various applications such as video, voice, and data transmission.
"48DNXA04.0GA" and "2010/03/17" is silkscreened on the board. :This device uses the Atheros HB97 reference design.
==Links of Interest== [https://www.unex.com.tw/download/5782ff812b52b/14 Datasheet]
